title: GXGBet
author: GXGBet
content: Hello all! Our inaugural tournament is currently underway commencing 1 August 2022 00:00 UTC to 15 August 2022 08:00 UTC10,000 Euro prizemoney to give away!Tournament Details:Prize Pool - €10,000FREE Entry to everyoneTournament points awarded based on total bet sum.Play ANY game on our platform, from Casino to Live table games, slots and even SportsbookNo minimum or maximum betting amountOur site's minimum deposit amount is only €5Please click here for more details.

comments.author: Hamich124D
comments.body: Is there like a leaderboard on site that we can check to see how someone is doing compared to other participants ?

comments.author: roycilik
comments.body: Quote from: Hamich124D on August 01, 2022, 11:27:24 AMIs there like a leaderboard on site that we can check to see how someone is doing compared to other participants ?You can see it in the tournament section, just click "See all prize"
